column1: The Eagles Eyrie was a home of the Eagles located on the eastern side of the Misty Mountains. Its exact location is unknown
column2: however it is presumably close to the High Pass and Goblin-town. It was from this location that the Eagles helped the Elves of Rivendell keep watch over the lands east of the Misty Mountains
column3: gathering information about the Orcs in the region.

column1: In  the eagles of the eyrie rescued Thorin and Company from the tops of the trees at the Wargs clearing and took them to the Eagles Eyrie. Here they met the Great Eagle
column2: ate their first food since escaping the Goblins
column3: and spent the night. The next morning the eagles took the company from the Eyrie to the Carrock.
